content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Create new extractors module directory structure at mcp/src/extractors with mod.rs, mcp_call.rs, and bevy_response.rs files
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating module structure
Add extractors module to mcp/src/lib.rs and main.rs exports
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding module exports
Implement McpCallExtractor struct in mcp_call.rs with new() method and basic structure
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing McpCallExtractor struct
Implement BevyResponseExtractor struct in bevy_response.rs with new() method and basic structure
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing BevyResponseExtractor struct
Migrate entity_from_params to McpCallExtractor::entity_id() and update its usage in response_formatter.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating entity_from_params
Migrate resource_from_params to McpCallExtractor::resource_name() and update its usage
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating resource_from_params
Migrate remaining McpCallExtractor methods (component_list, port, message_from_params) from response_formatter.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating remaining McpCallExtractor methods
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Migrate pass_through_data to BevyResponseExtractor::pass_through() and update its usage
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating pass_through_data
Migrate array_count to BevyResponseExtractor::entity_count() and update its usage
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating array_count
Migrate count_from_data to BevyResponseExtractor and update its usage
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating count_from_data
Move extract_entity_from_response from tool_generator.rs to BevyResponseExtractor::spawned_entity_id()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after moving extract_entity_from_response
Move extract_query_component_count from tool_generator.rs to BevyResponseExtractor::query_component_count()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after moving extract_query_component_count
Move remaining extractors from tool_generator.rs (extract_query_params_from_context, extract_field_from_context)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after moving remaining extractors
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Update convert_extractor_type in tool_generator.rs to use new extractor methods
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating convert_extractor_type
Migrate parameter extraction functions from support/params.rs to McpCallExtractor methods
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating parameter extraction functions
Update ParamExtractor implementations in request_handler/extractors.rs to use McpCallExtractor
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating ParamExtractor implementations
Remove extractors module from response_formatter.rs and clean up imports
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing old extractors module
Remove inline extractor functions from tool_generator.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing inline extractors
Clean up support/params.rs to remove redundant functions now in McpCallExtractor
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after cleaning up params.rs
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and validating the implementation plan was followed
When code review subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
